import React from 'react' import {Unit} from "./UnitSelector/Unit" import {UnitSelector} from "./UnitSelector/UnitSelector" export const Defender = ({unit, setUnit, units}) => { const baseShields = units.find(unit2 => unit.name === unit2.name).base.shields return
{baseShields ? <>
🧊
{unit.base.shields} / {baseShields}
: null}
{unit.base.armor} (+){unit.research.armor} 🛡
= {defender.base.armor} + {armorResearch}
♥️
<>{unit.base.health} / {baseHealth}
 }
